    • com.tyrlib2.ai.steering.PointMass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IVehicle, IUpdateable

    public class PointMass
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVehicle
    A very simple vehicle model made up simply by a point mass.

    Sascha
